actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 95-244.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: An original resolution reported authorizing committee expenditures.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 95-244) Authorizes the Senate Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs to make expenditures, not to exceed $610,000, from the contingent fund of the Senate, for hearings and investigations.

titles.title: An original resolution reported authorizing committee expenditures.
